attributes.action: OUTLAW THE TEACHING OF THE CONCEPT OF HELL OR HELL-FIRE TO CHILDREN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It should be a criminal offence for any person to teach the concept of hell or hell fire to anyone under the age of sixteen.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
